name: Happy Merge Cafe
description:
In this fun and interesting merge game, you will get hundreds of beautiful items and tools, and start a creative journey that you can't help carrying on! Get away from the noise of the world and create a magnificent, unparalleled and exclusive small town community by passing the merge levels.

Game features:
- High definition picture quality and detailed animations to relieve your eyes of fatigue
- Easy to play, easy to learn. Merge, evolve, upgrade, anyone can play anytime, anywhere, it's that simple.
- Countless fun and challenging merge tasks to challenge your brain power and enjoy your merge talent.
- Upgrading can win rich treasure chest rewards for free, help you unlock new areas and make your community more gorgeous.
- Feel free to plan and design everything as you wish! As you play, you'll be flooded with design ideas and inspiration to place items, decorate gardens, furnish houses and build your dream neighborhood just the way you like it!

If you like fun and exciting merge games, finding new combinations as well as matching and upgrading items, and enjoying your interest in house renovation, interior design, estate restoration, remodeling, gardening, home improvement and other design-related things, then join our big merge family! What are you waiting for? Come and enjoy creating the most amazing and charming town community of your dreams!
